metadata.Title: CVE-2015-6820 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: The ff_sbr_apply function in libavcodec/aacsbr.c in FFmpeg before 2.7.2 does not check for a matching AAC frame syntax element before proceeding with Spectral Band Replication calculations, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds array access) or possibly have unspecified other impact via crafted AAC data.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> as of 2016-03-11, no equivalent fix in libav ebarretto> as of 2018-09-27, no equivalent fix in libav

criterions.comment: libav: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
